notes.note:
HTTPS DNS records can now be resolved with the operating system's DNS resolver on specific platforms (Windows 11, Linux, Android 10+). Previously this required [DNS over HTTPS][1] to be enabled. This capability allows the use of HTTP/3 without needing to use the [Alt-Svc][2] header, upgrades requests to HTTPS when the DNS record is present, and enables wider use of [ECH][3].


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/firefox-dns-over-https
  [2]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Alt-Svc
  [3]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/faq-encrypted-client-hello
Downloading languages is now available to facilitate offline Translations.
